name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Data Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development and strong proficiency in SQL and **dbt**, leveraging **Snowflake** for data warehousing solutions and integration with **SAP** and **Salesforce** for enhanced business analytics. Expertise in the implementation of data visualization tools like **Power BI** to deliver actionable insights. Proven skills in version control using **Git** and CI/CD practices to streamline deployment processes. Recognized for strong teamwork and collaborative project delivery, having contributed to high-impact financial projects at industry leaders such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Committed to designing and optimizing scalable backend systems and automation pipelines.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **SQL** to interact with databases effectively, ensuring accurate data retrieval and manipulation for analytics.
Implemented **dbt** for data transformation, enhancing data quality and facilitating easier reporting processes.
Integrated with **Snowflake** to manage data warehousing solutions, optimizing storage and performance for large datasets.
Collaborated with **SAP** and **Salesforce** to extract and integrate data from various sources, supporting comprehensive data analysis.
Developed visualizations using **Power BI** to communicate insights and data-driven recommendations effectively.
Utilized **Git** for version control, ensuring seamless collaboration and code management across the team.
Enhanced deployment processes with **CI-CD** practices, achieving a deployment frequency of **5 times per week**.
Fostered **teamwork** by collaborating with cross-functional teams, addressing system integration challenges, and ensuring timely project completion.

• Utilized **SQL** for efficient data querying and manipulation within various databases, ensuring accurate data reporting and analysis for internal stakeholders.
• Built data transformation workflows using **dbt** to enhance data quality and consistency across the pipeline, achieving a reduction in processing time by **30%**.
• Integrated **Snowflake** for scalable data warehousing solutions, enabling the team to handle a **50TB** increase in data storage without performance degradation.
• Developed dashboards in **Power BI** for real-time data visualization, which improved decision-making speeds by **25%** and facilitated actionable insights.
• Collaborated with **Salesforce** and **SAP** systems to ensure seamless data flow and integrity across platforms, enhancing user experience during the onboarding process.
• Implemented version control using **Git** to manage code changes efficiently, resulting in a **40%** increase in team productivity and collaboration.
• Established CI/CD pipelines to automate application deployment and minimize downtimes, achieving a deployment frequency of **3 times per week** through continuous integration strategies.
• Fostered a culture of teamwork and cross-functional collaboration, successfully leading multiple projects to completion under tight deadlines while maintaining high quality standards.

Utilized **SQL** to construct and manage data pipelines, ensuring efficient data retrieval and integration across various platforms for analytics
Developed data transformation workflows using **dbt** to enhance data quality and accuracy, leading to a **30%** reduction in data processing time
Leveraged **Snowflake** for cloud-based data warehousing, achieving a **50%** improvement in report generation speed for stakeholders
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate data solutions with **SAP** and **Salesforce**, ensuring seamless data flow across systems
Employed **Power BI** for creating dynamic dashboards, providing actionable insights and visualizations that improved decision-making processes by **40%**
Managed version control and collaborative development practices using **Git**, enhancing teamwork and project coordination across **5** major data projects
Implemented CI-CD processes to automate deployment workflows, reducing manual effort and increasing code reliability in the data engineering lifecycle
Demonstrated exceptional **teamwork** skills by actively participating in daily stand-ups and sprint planning, ensuring alignment on project goals and timelines.
